author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, WWT dives into how Unreal Engine is powering the next generation of actionable, AI-enhanced digital twins.

Digital twins are no longer just conceptual or confined to R&D. They're becoming real, usable, and embedded in daily operations driving decision-making, enhancing marketing experiences, and creating new business value. 

Watch the video to see how AI is transforming digital twins into predictive, autonomous systems; the demo, a live example of using digital twins to drive experiential storytelling and marketing impact; real-world examples where digital twins are being used for simulation, operations, and customer engagement; and best practices for making digital twins truly usable—not just technically possible.

To find out more about using Unreal Engine for digital twins, check out our website: unrealengine.com/digital-twins

#DigitalTwins, #WWT, #AI, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #UnrealFestOrlando
title: Digital Twins Made Real: From Simulation to Execution with Unreal Engine | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025 to discover the latest and greatest when it comes to virtual production features in Unreal Engine. 

In this session, Lead Technical Product Manager Ryan Mayeda provides a sneak peek into the roadmap for Unreal Engine 5.6 and beyond. Catch up on the latest updates and get a preview of what’s coming up next for visualization, in-camera VFX, post-production, and everything in between.

Learn more about using Unreal Engine for film and TV here: unrealengine.com/uses/film-television

#VirtualProduction, #Visualization, #InCameraVFX, #PostProduction, #Film&TV, #UnrealEngine, #UE 5.6, #UE5, #UnrealFestOrlando
title: State of Virtual Production | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Mutable is an Unreal Engine plugin for creating character customization systems, enabling dynamic changes to characters and other assets during gameplay. While it's primarily used for character customization, Mutable is adaptable to other dynamic content like vehicles, weapons, and props.

In this talk you'll learn what Mutable is, how to use it, and most importantly, how not to use it. You'll find out how to take the most advantage of it, and how to avoid the most common pitfalls. The session concludes with a review of real projects that are currently using Mutable, pointing up the different use cases of Mutable and also the lessons learned during development.
title: Deep Dive into Customizations With Mutable | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025
